reviews.text: This is a great option that ticks just about all boxes.
reviews.title: Great option

reviews.text: - Staff, competent and helpful with adequate English spoken.
reviews.title: A Most Delightful and Helpful Hotel!

likes.liked: — The hotel's help prior to our arrival in arranging our reservations, travel and logistal needs.

reviews.text: - Room; decent size with all the necessary frills - big TV, nice shower (no bath), coffee and tea etc.
reviews.title: Cosy Considerate Hotel

likes.liked: — The service attitude and bedroom amenities

reviews.title: Loving it~~
reviews.text: - Bedding; good mattress and decent linen.
- Breakfast; average but enough to get the day started.
reviews.title: a great stay at TS

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the TS Hotel in September 2007 for 4 nights and we were very satisfied with our stay. We found the rooms to be very clean and equipped with every convenience. Every room came with a flatscreen LCD TV (of course, since this IS Taiwan) with cable, a refrigerator, a hot water heater for tea, and a free high speed internet connection. Best of all, the location one block from the Ximen MRT stop could not be beat.
reviews.title: Clean, convenient hotel in Ximending

reviews.text: The bathroom was spotless, and every room has a spa shower. The room charge includes free breakfast every morning in the dining room off the lobby. Breakfast consisted of a small buffet with rice porridge and side dishes, in addition to toast, jam, and butter. There is a convenience store practically across the street, and the hotel is literally 1.5 blocks away from the Ximending pedestrian area.
reviews.title: Good Value, Clean Rooms

likes.liked: — Clean and nicely priced, with large rooms

reviews.text: Overall, we were pleased with our stay here. The hotel was clean, the staff was helpful and polite, the price was right, and the location was extremely convenient.
reviews.title: Good Value for Money!!

reviews.text: This is a clean, budget-priced hotel, very near to the Ximen subway line. Its location is great for exploring Taipei. The staff is friendly.
reviews.title: Cosy budget hotel
Great Hotel, Good location
reviews.text: This hotel seems to lean more towards the family-friendly hotel side, rather than the love hotel side, unlike other hotels in the Ximen area. (There is a softcore adult movie channel, however, but most other hotels in this area have hardcore porn channels, which might bring an unpleasant surprise to many travellers, especially those with children.)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My first time to Taipei and I choose this hotel after hearing good reviews from my friends. It is as good as it is seen from the hotel website photos. Take a Freego bus to and fro Tao Yuan Airport for a cheap yet comfortable journey.
reviews.title: I will definitely come back for TS Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Highly accessible as it is just a 5 min walk from Xi Men Ding Metro station and Xi Men Ding Shopping heaven. And rest assured it is safe and peaceful as it is located near a police station.
reviews.title: Great location, comfortable room and friendly receptions

reviews.text: We paid NT$1680 for a double bed room. Definitely worth the money! Once I stepped into the room, a 40 inch LCD TV greeted me, follow by a heart shape pillow waiting welcoming us to TS hotel. For the amount we paid, we are surprised to see a bath tub and water spa included! Breakfast is a mixture of chinese and western variety.
reviews.title: Good location, nice big rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall, it is worth every pound and penny of my money. If I ever come back to Taipei, it has got to be TS Hotel.
reviews.title: Really cozy!

reviews.text: This is the hotel i stayed for my first visit to Taipei during 8-14 March 2008. We booked through email, the hotel turned out to be exactly like what we saw from the photo in the internet. We took a superior suite with Queen size bed, it is just nice for 2 person. Room furnished with flat screen TV with >100 channels, Spa type shower, big bath tub, mini refrigerator, etc.
reviews.title: Great service & location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed here for 5 nights in May and was very happy with this hotel. The highlights:
reviews.title: Very good accomodation in good location

reviews.text: 1) Reservation was easy - http://www.tshotel.com.tw, no credit card required to make reservation. I was contacted by Conney who was very helpful with providing rate info and making the reservation all through e-mails in English.
reviews.title: Best value for money stay in Taipei!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 2) Rooms - good sized rooms, nicely furnished or re-modeled. Our room did not have windows but that turned out to be a plus since we slept better without being awakened by the very early sunrise in Taiwan. Very quiet. The fridge was useful. Bottled water was provided daily. Nice shower!
reviews.title: Comfort & accessible

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 3) Location - excellent. It is on a quiet side street 1 block away from a fun busy area, so you have the best of both worlds. Easy access to MRT, Ximending, shopping, restaurants, nightlife, etc.
reviews.title: A charming little hotel in the heart of the trendy district of Ximending!

reviews.text: 4) Breakfast - very good, if you like a Chinese breakfast (or adventurous enough to try one). But if you prefer a western continental breakfast, you should try elsewhere. Breakfast is like a mini-buffet of porridge, porridge toppers, eggs, stir-fried veggie, seasoned tofu, taiwanese meatballs, ham, etc, definitely enough to fill up. Toast, coffee and orange juice also available.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

likes.disliked: — Room was rather small but that is being picky
